'''13w48b''' is the seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.7.4]], released on November 26, 2013<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|405405003923587072|Minecraft snapshot 13w48b has been released for some more smaller bugfixes!|November 26, 2013}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w48a]] snapshot.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Sheep]]'''
* Naming a sheep "jeb_" (with a [[name tag]]) makes the sheep's wool fade between the different [[dye]] colors in order (like a rainbow effect).
** [[Shear]]ing produces the color [[wool]] the sheep had before it was named.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w48b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|35897|Damaged armor, tools & weapons placed in certain inventory slots cause other slots to go black.
|36482|Upon exiting (shift-click) minecart, the range and criteria is drastically off, up to 8 blocks away.
|;prev
|40947|Opening Broadcast settings crash.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 13w48b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
